trans-unit.source: Represents a base class that implements common functionality for a related end.
trans-unit.target: 表示实现相关端的常见功能的基类。

trans-unit.source: RelatedEnd is the base class for the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> class and the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601> class.
trans-unit.target: RelatedEnd 是基类的<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>类和<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601>类。</xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601> </xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>

trans-unit.source: The RelatedEnd class implements functionality that is shared between the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> and <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601> classes.
trans-unit.target: RelatedEnd 类实现之间共享的功能<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>和<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601>类。</xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601> </xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>

trans-unit.source: This class is not intended to be used directly in your code.
trans-unit.target: 此类不应在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a change is made to a related end.
trans-unit.target: 到相关端进行更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: The AssociationChanged event is raised by the following methods: - <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601.Add%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601.Remove%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601.Load%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601.Load%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601.Attach%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601.Clear%2A?displayProperty=fullName> Events may be suppressed during bulk operations, such as `Load`, <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601.Attach%2A>, and <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601.Clear%2A>.
trans-unit.target: AssociationChanged 事件由以下方法引发:- <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601.Add%2A?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601.Remove%2A?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601.Load%2A?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601.Load%2A?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601.Attach%2A?displayProperty=fullName>-<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601.Clear%2A?displayProperty=fullName>事件可禁止显示在大容量操作期间如`Load`， <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601.Attach%2A>，和<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601.Clear%2A>。</xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601.Clear%2A> </xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601.Attach%2A> </xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601.Clear%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601.Attach%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601.Load%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601.Load%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601.Remove%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601.Add%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Returns an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> that iterates through the collection of related objects.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>，它循环访问的相关对象的集合。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> that iterates through the collection of related objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>，它循环访问的相关对象的集合。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether all related objects have been loaded.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否已加载所有相关的对象。

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.Load%2A> method sets the IsLoaded flag to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.Load%2A>方法将 IsLoaded 标志设置为`true`。</xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.Load%2A>

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601.Clear%2A> method on an <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> sets IsLoaded to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601.Clear%2A>方法<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>设置 IsLoaded `false`。</xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> </xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601.Clear%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> or <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601> may also be loaded if the related end is included in the query path.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>或<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601>也可能会加载如果相关的端包含在查询路径。</xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601> </xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>

trans-unit.source: For more information about span, see [Loading Related Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/452347d2-7b3b-44cd-9001-231299a28cb1).
trans-unit.target: 有关范围的详细信息，请参阅[加载相关对象](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/452347d2-7b3b-44cd-9001-231299a28cb1)。

trans-unit.source: The `Load` method on <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> and <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601> loads related objects from the data source whether or not IsLoaded is `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Load`方法<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>和<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601>将相关的对象加载从数据源是否 IsLoaded 是`true`。</xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601> </xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>

trans-unit.source: When an object is detached, the IsLoaded flag is changed from `false` to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 当对象分离时，将从更改 IsLoaded 标志`false`到`true`。

trans-unit.source: To guarantee that a related end is fully loaded before doing processing, you should check whether IsLoaded is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 若要确保在进行处理之前相关的端是完全加载，你应检查是否 IsLoaded `false`。

trans-unit.source: If IsLoaded is `false`, you should call the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.Load%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果 IsLoaded `false`，应调用<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.Load%2A>方法。</xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.Load%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the related end contains all the related objects from the database; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果相关的端包含数据库; 中的所有相关的对象否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, loads the related object or objects into the related end with the default merge option.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写到相关端使用默认合并选项加载相关的对象。

trans-unit.source: The default merge option is <xref:System.Data.Objects.MergeOption> for tracked objects or <xref:System.Data.Objects.MergeOption> when the object is not tracked in the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateManager>.
trans-unit.target: 默认合并选项是<xref:System.Data.Objects.MergeOption>用于跟踪的对象还是<xref:System.Data.Objects.MergeOption><xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateManager>。</xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateManager>不跟踪的对象时</xref:System.Data.Objects.MergeOption></xref:System.Data.Objects.MergeOption>

trans-unit.source: To specify a merge option other than <xref:System.Data.Objects.MergeOption>, call the `Load` method on the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> or the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601> that takes a specific <xref:System.Data.Objects.MergeOption> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定合并选项换不同<xref:System.Data.Objects.MergeOption>，调用`Load`方法<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>或<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601>采用特定<xref:System.Data.Objects.MergeOption>参数。</xref:System.Data.Objects.MergeOption> </xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601> </xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> </xref:System.Data.Objects.MergeOption>

trans-unit.source: Calling the Load method sets the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.IsLoaded%2A> flag to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 调用负载方法设置<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.IsLoaded%2A>标志切换为`true`。</xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.IsLoaded%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Load method loads related objects from the data source whether or not <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.IsLoaded%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Load 方法将相关的对象加载从数据源是否<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.IsLoaded%2A>是`true`。</xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.IsLoaded%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the source object was retrieved by using a <xref href="System.Data.Objects.MergeOption"></xref> query and the <xref href="System.Data.Objects.MergeOption"></xref> is not <xref href="System.Data.Objects.MergeOption"></xref> or the related objects are already loaded.
trans-unit.target: 当通过检索源对象<xref href="System.Data.Objects.MergeOption"></xref>查询和<xref href="System.Data.Objects.MergeOption"></xref>不<xref href="System.Data.Objects.MergeOption"></xref>或已加载相关的对象。

trans-unit.source: -or- When the source object is not attached to the <xref href="System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: -或-当源对象未附加到<xref href="System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: -or- When the source object is being tracked but is in the <xref href="System.Data.EntityState"></xref> or <xref href="System.Data.EntityState"></xref> state or the <xref href="System.Data.Objects.MergeOption"></xref> used for Load is <xref href="System.Data.Objects.MergeOption"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: -或-当源对象正在跟踪，但在<xref href="System.Data.EntityState"></xref>或<xref href="System.Data.EntityState"></xref>状态或<xref href="System.Data.Objects.MergeOption"></xref>使用负载为<xref href="System.Data.Objects.MergeOption"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, loads an object or objects from the related end with the specified merge option.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，从相关端使用指定的合并选项加载一个或多个对象。

trans-unit.source: Both <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> and <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601> override this method to load related objects.
trans-unit.target: 同时<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>和<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601>重写此方法以加载相关的对象。</xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601> </xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>

trans-unit.source: `Load` is called to explicitly load related objects from a related end exposed by a navigation property.
trans-unit.target: `Load`调用以从导航属性公开的相关端显式加载相关的对象。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Loading Related Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/452347d2-7b3b-44cd-9001-231299a28cb1).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[加载相关对象](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/452347d2-7b3b-44cd-9001-231299a28cb1)。

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.Load%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.IsLoaded%2A> flag to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.Load%2A>方法设置<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.IsLoaded%2A>标志切换为`true`。</xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.IsLoaded%2A> </xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.Load%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Load method loads related objects from the data source whether or not <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.IsLoaded%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Load 方法将相关的对象加载从数据源是否<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.IsLoaded%2A>是`true`。</xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.IsLoaded%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default merge option is <xref:System.Data.Objects.MergeOption> for tracked objects or <xref:System.Data.Objects.MergeOption> when the object is not tracked in the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateManager>.
trans-unit.target: 默认合并选项是<xref:System.Data.Objects.MergeOption>用于跟踪的对象还是<xref:System.Data.Objects.MergeOption><xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateManager>。</xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateManager>不跟踪的对象时</xref:System.Data.Objects.MergeOption></xref:System.Data.Objects.MergeOption>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.Objects.MergeOption"></xref> to use when merging objects into an existing <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.Objects.MergeOption"> </xref>合并到现有对象时要使用<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>。

trans-unit.source: When the source object was retrieved by using a <xref href="System.Data.Objects.MergeOption"></xref> query and the <xref href="System.Data.Objects.MergeOption"></xref> is not <xref href="System.Data.Objects.MergeOption"></xref> or the related objects are already loaded.
trans-unit.target: 当通过检索源对象<xref href="System.Data.Objects.MergeOption"></xref>查询和<xref href="System.Data.Objects.MergeOption"></xref>不<xref href="System.Data.Objects.MergeOption"></xref>或已加载相关的对象。

trans-unit.source: -or- When the source object is not attached to the <xref href="System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: -或-当源对象未附加到<xref href="System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: -or- When the source object is being tracked but is in the <xref href="System.Data.EntityState"></xref> or <xref href="System.Data.EntityState"></xref> state or the <xref href="System.Data.Objects.MergeOption"></xref> used for <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.Load*> is <xref href="System.Data.Objects.MergeOption"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: -或-当源对象正在跟踪，但在<xref href="System.Data.EntityState"></xref>或<xref href="System.Data.EntityState"></xref>状态或<xref href="System.Data.Objects.MergeOption"></xref>用于<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.Load*>是<xref href="System.Data.Objects.MergeOption"> </xref>。</xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.Load*>

trans-unit.source: Used internally to deserialize entity objects along with the <xref href="System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager"></xref> instances.
trans-unit.target: 在内部用于反序列化实体对象连同<xref href="System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelationshipManager"></xref>实例。

trans-unit.source: The serialized stream.
trans-unit.target: 序列化的流。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the relationship in which this related end participates.
trans-unit.target: 获取此相关的端所参与的关系的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the relationship in which this <xref href="System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd"></xref> participates.
trans-unit.target: 在此关系的名称<xref href="System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd"></xref>参与。

trans-unit.source: The relationship name is not namespace qualified.
trans-unit.target: 关系名称不是命名空间限定。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the metadata for the related end.
trans-unit.target: 对相关端中获取元数据的引用。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.RelationshipSet"></xref> object that contains metadata for the end of a relationship.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.RelationshipSet"> </xref>包含关系一端的元数据的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets the role name at the source end of the relationship.
trans-unit.target: 获取关系的源端的角色名称。

trans-unit.source: The role name is specified by the `Role` attribute of the `End` element in the association that defines this relationship in the conceptual model.
trans-unit.target: 角色名称由指定`Role`属性`End`概念模型中定义此关系的关联中的元素。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Association Element (CSDL)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/c305169a-8af7-432f-9ba7-800a163aed41).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[关联元素 (CSDL)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/c305169a-8af7-432f-9ba7-800a163aed41)。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that is the role name.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>角色名称。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Adds an object to the related end.
trans-unit.target: 将对象添加到相关端。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd> interface.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用它时，才<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd>实例被强制转换为<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd>接口。</xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd> </xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd>

trans-unit.source: The IRelatedEnd.Add method is only maintained for compatibility with previous versions of the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 保留 IRelatedEnd.Add 方法只是为了与以前版本的.NET Framework 兼容。

trans-unit.source: An object to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要添加到集合的对象。

trans-unit.source: This object must implement the <xref href="System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships"></xref> interface.
trans-unit.target: 此对象必须实现<xref href="System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships"></xref>接口。

trans-unit.source: Adds an object to the related end.
trans-unit.target: 将对象添加到相关端。

trans-unit.source: If the source entity object is attached to a cache, then all the connected ends are added to the object cache and their corresponding relationships are also added to the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateManager>.
trans-unit.target: 如果源实体对象附加到缓存中，所有连接的端点添加到对象缓存和其相应关系也将添加到<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateManager>。</xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateManager>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> of the relationship is also fixed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd>还固定的关系。</xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd>

trans-unit.source: An entity instance to add to the related end.
trans-unit.target: 要添加到相关端的实体实例。

trans-unit.source: Attaches an object at the related end.
trans-unit.target: 将附加到相关端的对象。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd> interface.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用它时，才<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd>实例被强制转换为<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd>接口。</xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd> </xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd>

trans-unit.source: The IRelatedEnd.Attach method is only maintained for compatibility with previous versions of the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 保留 IRelatedEnd.Attach 方法只是为了与以前版本的.NET Framework 兼容。

trans-unit.source: The object being attached.
trans-unit.target: 要附加的对象。

trans-unit.source: Attaches an object to the related end.
trans-unit.target: 将对象附加到相关端。

trans-unit.source: If the related end already has some entities attached to it, the existing entities will be merged with the new entity.
trans-unit.target: 如果相关的端已附加到它的某些实体，将与新的实体合并现有实体。

trans-unit.source: The new entity is not assumed to be the complete set of related entity objects.
trans-unit.target: 新的实体不被假定相关的实体对象的完整集。

trans-unit.source: The source entity object and all entity objects passed in must be in an <xref:System.Data.EntityState> or <xref:System.Data.EntityState> state.
trans-unit.target: 源实体对象和所有传入的实体对象必须为<xref:System.Data.EntityState>或<xref:System.Data.EntityState>状态。</xref:System.Data.EntityState> </xref:System.Data.EntityState>

trans-unit.source: Deleted elements are allowed only when the state manager is already tracking the relationship instance.
trans-unit.target: 仅当状态管理器已经跟踪关系实例时，才允许已删除的元素。

trans-unit.source: An entity instance to attach to the related end.
trans-unit.target: 要将附加到相关端的实体实例。

trans-unit.source: Returns an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> that represents the objects that belong to the related end.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>，它表示属于相关端对象。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd> interface.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用它时，才<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd>实例被强制转换为<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd>接口。</xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd> </xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> and <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601> both override IRelatedEnd.CreateSourceQuery to return an <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>和<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601>都重写 IRelatedEnd.CreateSourceQuery 返回<xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601>.</xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> </xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601></xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>

trans-unit.source: This query, when it is executed, returns the same set of objects that belong to the related end.
trans-unit.target: 此查询，它执行时，返回属于相关端的对象属于同一套。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> that represents the objects that belong to the related end.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>，它表示属于相关端对象。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: Removes an object from the collection at the related end.
trans-unit.target: 从相关端的集合中移除一个对象。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd> interface.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用它时，才<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd>实例被强制转换为<xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd>接口。</xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd> </xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd>

trans-unit.source: The IRelatedEnd.Remove method is only maintained for compatibility with previous versions of the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 保留 IRelatedEnd.Remove 方法只是为了与以前版本的.NET Framework 兼容。

trans-unit.source: The entity instance to remove from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要从集合中移除的实体实例。

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates whether the object was removed.
trans-unit.target: 一个值，该值指示是否已删除对象。

trans-unit.source: Removes an object from the related end if the object is part of the related end.
trans-unit.target: 如果对象是相关端的一部分，请从相关端移除一个对象。

trans-unit.source: If the source entity object is attached to a cache, the relationship is marked for deletion.
trans-unit.target: 如果源实体对象附加到缓存中，关系标记为删除。

trans-unit.source: An entity instance to remove from the related end.
trans-unit.target: 要从相关端中删除的实体实例。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the entity was successfully removed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已成功删除该实体;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the role name at the target end of the relationship.
trans-unit.target: 获取关系的目标端的角色名称。

trans-unit.source: The role name is specified by the `Role` attribute of the `End` element in the association that defines this relationship in the conceptual model.
trans-unit.target: 角色名称由指定`Role`属性`End`概念模型中定义此关系的关联中的元素。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Association Element (CSDL)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/c305169a-8af7-432f-9ba7-800a163aed41).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[关联元素 (CSDL)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/c305169a-8af7-432f-9ba7-800a163aed41)。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that is the role name.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>角色名称。</xref:System.String>
